price: "Yã kũ mutãnẽna! Kunã da mulki a yau, kuma kũ ne marinjãya a cikin kasã to wãne ne zai taimake mu daga azãbar Allah idan ta zo mana?" Fir'auna ya ce: "Bã ni nũnamuku kõme face abin da na gani, kuma ba ni shiryar da ku, sai ga hanyar shiryuwa."
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ لَكُمُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ظَٰهِرِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَمَن يَنصُرُنَا مِنۢ بَأۡسِ ٱللَّهِ إِن جَآءَنَاۚ قَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ مَآ أُرِيكُمۡ إِلَّا مَآ أَرَىٰ وَمَآ أَهۡدِيكُمۡ إِلَّا سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi lakumu al-mul'ku al-yawma ẓāhirīna fī al-arḍi faman yanṣurunā min basi al-lahi in jāanā qāla fir'ʿawnu mā urīkum illā mā arā wamā ahdīkum illā sabīla al-rashādi
